# OpInterface definitions
## LayerOpInterface (`IE_LayerOpInterface`)

Base interface for IE Layer Operation
### Methods:
#### `getInputs`

```c++
mlir::OperandRange getInputs();
```
Get all layer input tensors
NOTE: This method *must* be implemented by the user.

#### `getOutputs`

```c++
mlir::ResultRange getOutputs();
```
Get all layer output tensors
NOTE: This method *must* be implemented by the user.

#### `getDataOrderInfo`

```c++
vpux::IE::DataOrderInfo getDataOrderInfo();
```
Get information about current layout for Layer inputs and outputs
NOTE: This method *must* be implemented by the user.

## LayerWithPostOpInterface (`IE_LayerWithPostOpInterface`)

Interface for operations that support post-processing
### Methods:
#### `post_op`

```c++
vpux::Optional<vpux::IE::PostOp> post_op();
```
Get the post-processing operation
NOTE: This method *must* be implemented by the user.

#### `post_opAttr`

```c++
void post_opAttr(vpux::IE::PostOp postOp);
```
Set post-processing operation attribute
NOTE: This method *must* be implemented by the user.
